questions.question: Is this app school-specific?
questions.answer: No, CLASSRAUM is designed to work with any educational institution - from individual tutors to large schools and academies. Our platform is flexible and adapts to your specific needs, whether you're teaching 10 students or managing 1000+. You can customize the system to match your institution's workflow and requirements.

questions.question: Who enters the grades?
questions.answer: Teachers and authorized staff members can enter grades directly into the system. Each user has specific permissions based on their role - teachers can only access their assigned classes, while administrators have broader access. All grade entries are tracked with timestamps and user identification for complete accountability.

questions.question: Can I download or print the reports?
questions.answer: Yes! All reports can be downloaded in multiple formats including PDF, Excel, and CSV. You can print individual student reports, class summaries, or comprehensive institutional reports. The system also allows you to customize report templates to match your institution's branding and requirements.

questions.question: What happens after the free trial?
questions.answer: After your 10-day free trial ends, you can choose to subscribe to one of our plans or your account will be paused. Your data remains safe and accessible for 30 days, giving you time to decide. If you subscribe within this period, you'll have immediate access to all your data and can continue using the platform seamlessly.

questions.question: Who can see the report card data?
questions.answer: Access to report card data is strictly controlled. Students can only see their own data, parents can only access their children's information, and teachers can only view data for their assigned classes. Administrators have broader access based on their role. All access is logged and monitored for security purposes.

questions.question: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Your data will remain accessible for 90 days after cancellation, allowing you to export any information you need. After this period, data is securely deleted from our servers. You can reactivate your account within the 90-day window to restore full access.

questions.question: Is there a mobile app available?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer mobile apps for both iOS and Android devices (available with Medium Academy plan and above). The mobile app provides full functionality including grade entry, attendance tracking, communication tools, and report viewing. Students and parents can also access their information through the mobile app.

questions.question: Can multiple children be tracked under one account?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Parent accounts can be linked to multiple children, allowing them to view all their children's progress from a single dashboard. Each child's data remains separate and secure, but parents get a consolidated view of attendance, grades, assignments, and communications for all their children.

questions.question: Is my child's data safe and private?
questions.answer: Data security and privacy are our top priorities. We use enterprise-grade encryption, secure servers, and comply with all major privacy regulations including GDPR and COPPA. Student data is never shared with third parties, and we implement strict access controls to ensure only authorized individuals can view sensitive information.

questions.question: Do you offer support if I have technical issues?
questions.answer: Yes! We provide comprehensive support through multiple channels including email, live chat, and phone support. Our support team is available during business hours, and we also offer extensive documentation, video tutorials, and a knowledge base. Premium plans include priority support with faster response times.
